overview:
Nikolaos Nanas (PhD) is a researcher in the area of Artificial Intelligence and more specifically Biologically Inspired Computing. He has developed and studied extensively a new computational model for Adaptive Information Filtering and has now turned his efforts to applying this model in practice.

Nikolaos Nanas is the co-founder of NOOWIT and in addition to providing the underlying scientific expertise, he is responsible for the NOOWIT’s design and front-end development, it’s business strategy and development.

NOOWIT is the result of more than ten years of research and two years of design and development. The above computational lies at the core of NOOWIT’s adaptive capabilities and responsive design.
